name: Singularity (itch) (AlexNerd)
description:
Five college students were going to work on a project for the first week of winter break. It was supposed to be simple and mostly safe: study the old foundations under the college and see why they held up so well. It seemed to be going normally. Then the students disappeared. Then they just as quickly reappeared.

Follow the story of these students, told in flashbacks, as they tell of what they discovered. The implications of their discovery might change the course of history forever...but at what cost?
